languages.text: {n}Мехадендриты быстро и точно срывают несколько мясистых листьев, складывают их в контейнер и вкладывают вам в руки.{/n} "Органические формы жизни не являются приоритетным объектом для изучения. Однако мне импонирует ваша жажда познаний".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мехадендриты быстро и точно срывают несколько мясистых листьев, складывают их в контейнер и вкладывают вам в руки.{/n} "Органические формы жизни не являются приоритетным объектом для изучения. Однако мне импонирует ваша жажда познаний".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}The mechadendrites swiftly and accurately pluck several fleshy leaves, deposit them in a container, and put it into your hands.{/n} "Organic life forms are not considered a research priority. However, I find your thirst for knowledge impressive."
languages.original_text: {n}Мехадендриты быстро и точно срывают несколько мясистых листьев, складывают их в контейнер и вкладывают вам в руки.{/n} "Органические формы жизни не являются приоритетным объектом для изучения. Однако мне импонирует ваша жажда познаний".

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The mechadendrites swiftly and accurately pluck several fleshy leaves, deposit them in a container and put it into your hands.{/n} "Organic life forms are not considered a research priority. However, I am impressed by your thirst for knowledge."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The mechadendrites swiftly and accurately pluck several fleshy leaves, deposit them in a container, and put it into your hands.{/n} "Organic life forms are not considered a research priority. However, I find your thirst for knowledge impressive."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The mechadendrites swiftly and accurately pluck several fleshy leaves, deposit them in a container, and put it into your hands.{/n} "Organic life forms are not considered a research priority. However, I find your thirst for knowledge impressive."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The mechadendrites swiftly and accurately pluck several fleshy leaves, deposit them in a container, and put it into your hands.{/n} "Organic life forms are not considered a research priority. However, I find your thirst for knowledge impressive."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}機械触手が素早くかつ正確に肉厚の葉を数枚採取し、容器に入れて手渡してきた。{/n}「有機生命体は研究の優先事項とは考えられていません。ですが、陛下の知識に対する貪欲さには感心します」
languages.original_text: {n}The mechadendrites swiftly and accurately pluck several fleshy leaves, deposit them in a container, and put it into your hands.{/n} "Organic life forms are not considered a research priority. However, I find your thirst for knowledge impressive."

traits.locale_text: {n}機械触手が素早くかつ正確に肉厚の葉を数枚採取し、容器に入れて手渡してきた。{/n}「有機生命体は研究の優先事項とは考えられていません。ですが、陛下の知識に対する貪欲さには感心します」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Las mecadendritas arrancan varias hojas carnosas de forma rápida y precisa, las depositan en un contenedor y te lo entregan.{/n} «La investigación de formas de vida orgánicas no es prioritaria, pero alabo su sed de conocimientos».
languages.original_text: {n}The mechadendrites swiftly and accurately pluck several fleshy leaves, deposit them in a container, and put it into your hands.{/n} "Organic life forms are not considered a research priority. However, I find your thirst for knowledge impressive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las mecadendritas arrancan varias hojas carnosas de forma rápida y precisa, las depositan en un contenedor y te lo entregan.{/n} «La investigación de formas de vida orgánicas no es prioritaria, pero alabo su sed de conocimientos».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的机械触须快速而精准地摘下几枚肥厚的叶片，放进容器里，交给了你。{/n}“有机生命并不是我的研究重点。不过，我很欣赏你对知识的渴望。”
languages.original_text: {n}The mechadendrites swiftly and accurately pluck several fleshy leaves, deposit them in a container, and put it into your hands.{/n} "Organic life forms are not considered a research priority. However, I find your thirst for knowledge impressive."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的机械触须快速而精准地摘下几枚肥厚的叶片，放进容器里，交给了你。{/n}“有机生命并不是我的研究重点。不过，我很欣赏你对知识的渴望。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les mécadendrites cueillent plusieurs feuilles charnues prestement, les disposent dans un conteneur et vous le tendent.{/n} « Les formes de vie organiques ne font pas partie de nos recherches prioritaires, mais je dois avouer que votre soif de connaissance m'impressionne. »
languages.original_text: {n}The mechadendrites swiftly and accurately pluck several fleshy leaves, deposit them in a container, and put it into your hands.{/n} "Organic life forms are not considered a research priority. However, I find your thirst for knowledge impressive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mécadendrites cueillent plusieurs feuilles charnues prestement, les disposent dans un conteneur et vous le tendent.{/n} « Les formes de vie organiques ne font pas partie de nos recherches prioritaires, mais je dois avouer que votre soif de connaissance m'impressionne. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die Mechadendriten pflücken schnell und präzise mehrere fleischige Blätter, legen sie in einen Behälter und überreichen ihn Euch.{/n} "Die Erforschung organischer Lebensformen hat keine Priorität. Doch Euer Wissensdurst beeindruckt mich."
languages.original_text: {n}The mechadendrites swiftly and accurately pluck several fleshy leaves, deposit them in a container, and put it into your hands.{/n} "Organic life forms are not considered a research priority. However, I find your thirst for knowledge impressive."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Mechadendriten pflücken schnell und präzise mehrere fleischige Blätter, legen sie in einen Behälter und überreichen ihn Euch.{/n} "Die Erforschung organischer Lebensformen hat keine Priorität. Doch Euer Wissensdurst beeindruckt mich."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, mekadentritleriyle iri birkaç yaprağı hızla ve hatasızca koparıp bir konteynere koyuyor. Konteyneri eline veriyor.{/n} "Organik yaşam formları, araştırma için öncelik niteliği taşımaz. Yine de irfana duyduğunuz açlıktan etkilendim."
languages.original_text: {n}The mechadendrites swiftly and accurately pluck several fleshy leaves, deposit them in a container, and put it into your hands.{/n} "Organic life forms are not considered a research priority. However, I find your thirst for knowledge impressive."
